title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to any residential treatment facility for children and youth
licensed pursuant to article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law and issued an
operating certificate in accordance with Part 584 of this Title. (b) These regulations apply to the
establishment of rates of payment made by government agencies pursuant to title
11 of article 5 of the Social Services Law for services provided by a
residential treatment facility for children and youth. All payments by such
agencies shall be at rates of payment certified by the commissioner and
approved by the Director of the Budget pursuant to section
578.10
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
578.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
